Her main wish is for the roof to be in good condition and to spend more time with her daughters and to continue providing schooling for them so that they can complete their education.

loans.use: to repair her mother's roof.

loans.name: Leila Irene

texts.es: Leila, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive con una hija de las menores en el municipio de Villanueva Cortes. Hace 5 años que estableció su propio negocio de pulpería para obtener sus propios ingresos y poderle dar la manutención a su familia. en la pulpería vende granos básicos, manteca, pan, refrescos, azúcar, harina, productos enlatados, productos de higiene, churros etc. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo por 21,000 Lempiras para surtir el negocio y poder aumentar el inventario y las ganancias, comprara manteca, azúcar, arroz, huevos, churros, refrescos, lácteos y otros para vender. Su meta es crecer como empresaria y ver su negocio surtido.
texts.en:
Leila, 48, is a single mother of three children.  She lives with one of her younger daughters in the municipality of Villanueva, Cortes.  She started her own grocery business five years ago in order to earn her own income and be able to support her family.  She sells basic grains, shortening, bread, soft-drinks, sugar, flour, canned goods, cleaning supplies, snacks, etc. in the grocery store. 

She’s requested a 21,000 Lempira loan to stock the business and increase inventory and profits.  She’ll buy shortening, sugar, rice, eggs, snacks, soft-drinks, dairy products and others to sell.  Her goal is to grow as a businesswoman and to keep her store well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Dúo Fusion Group

texts.es: Dúo Fusión, representado por Irma de 30 años, soltera, quien se dedica a la venta de gas propano en su domicilio desde hace dos años, Irma se vio en la necesidad de crear su propio negocio después de ver que no podía seguir trabajando en una maquila y que conseguir trabajo era más difícil, aparte de vender gas también brinda servicios de sastrería, la gente ya la conoce sus vecinos de igual manera con la venta de gas ya que va a domicilio solo por la zona, espera poder crecer y poder tener su propia casa que es el anhelo que ella tiene para un futuro.
texts.en: The “Fusión” (Fusion) Duo is represented by Irma, 30.  She’s single and has been working selling propane gas from home for the last two years.  Irma had to start her own business because she couldn’t continue any longer employed at an assembly plant and getting another job was more difficult.  Besides selling gas, she also provides tailoring services.  People as well as her neighbors know her from the gas sales because she goes house to house in the zone.  She hopes to be able to grow and to be able to have a house of her own; that’s her dream for the future.

loans.use: to buy propane gas tanks.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La señora Ana tiene 53 años de edad, vive con sus 3 hijos, es viuda, su domicilio está ubicado en la comunidad de Monteagudo. Sus principales actividades de la señora Ana es la crianza de cerdos criollos y  producción de maíz, los cerdos los cría en corrales rústicos y obtiene ingresos cada seis meses de estas actividades.
Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora, es por eso que está solicitando crédito para la compra de insumos agrícola para la siembra de maíz, ya que están en campaña de producción,  de esta manera podrá obtener ingresos de esta actividad y también  cubrirá los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus 2 hijos que tiene, de esta manera sus hijos lograran  concluir sus estudios hasta salir profesionales y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 53 years old, she lives with her 3 children, she is a widow, and her home is located in the community of Monteagudo. Her primary responsibilities include taking care of pigs and growing corn. She cares for the pigs in old corrals and she is able to earn some money from this activity every six months or so. 
Ana is hard working, and that is why she is asking for this loan. She needs to purchase some supplies so she can plant more corn, because there has been a campaign promoting this produce, and so she hopes to be able to earn some more income. She also needs to cover the cost of school, everyday items, clothing, and other expenses that her 2 children have. By her helping them, her children will be able to finish their schooling and begin professional careers and have a better life.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies to plant corn.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a 22-year-old youth who lives in the Mukuru informal settlement of Nairobi, Kenya. As a resident of the slum, he faces various challenges, including a lack of proper sanitation facilities. He used a Fresh Life Toilet once and was impressed that the toilet was very clean. After this experience, he developed an interest in owning a Fresh Life toilet and running it as his own business.

Simon sees this as a good investment opportunity that will help him, as a youth, to improve his standard of living and the standard of living of those he will be serving. He knows that providing a solution to the sanitation issue in his area will reduce cases of sickness and create a cleaner environment for residents. Simon wishes to be a successful entrepreneur in the future and mentor other youth from the slums to be successful.

He therefore seeks a loan to help finance the purchase and running of one Fresh Life toilet. He believes this will be a great way to kick-start his investments and entrepreneurial dreams.

loans.use: to purchase and run one 'Fresh Life' toilet

loans.name: Irma Margarita

texts.es: Irma, tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene tres hijos y reside en el municipio de Taulabe. Hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de productos de abarrotería como ser productos enlatados, huevos, manteca, refrescos, arroz, azúcar, maíz, frijoles, harina, jabón, etc. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y ya cuenta con buena clientela. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 6,700 Lempiras para poder surtir su negocio de más productos como granos básicos, manteca, refrescos, y churros y satisfacer a sus clientes. Ella tiene previsto invertir las ganancias en reparar su casa para tener mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Irma, 38, is in a common law relationship with her husband and they have three children; she lives in the municipality of Taulabe.  She’s sold grocery items like canned goods, eggs, shortening, soft-drinks, rice, sugar, corn, beans, flour, soap, etc. for two years.  Her store is home-based and she already has a good clientele.

She’s decided to request a 6,700 Lempira loan to be able to stock her store with more products like basic grains, shortening, soft-drinks and snacks to meet customer demand.  She’s planning to invest her profits in home repairs in order to have better conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Dúo Buena Vista Group

texts.es:
Dúo buena vista
Dúo conformado por Marco Vinicio de 22 años de edad se dedica desde hace dos años a la crianza de cerdos. lucha para salir adelante y ha encontrado en su negocios una fuente de ingresos y con ello poder cubrir sus necesidades básicas. Tiene la ventaja que en el área donde vive es propicia y comerciable para esa actividad a que el se dedica. y solicita el crédito para la compra de Cerdos para la crianza, concentrado, vitaminas y desparasitantes, para los mismos.
texts.en: Marco Vinicio, 22, is part of the group Duo Buena Vista. He has been raising pigs for the last two years. He fights to succeed and in his business has found a source of income with which he is able to cover basic needs. He has the advantage of living in an area that is favorable for business. He is requesting this loan to buy pigs for breeding, feed, vitamins and anti-parasite treatment for them.

loans.use: to buy pigs for breeding and food for them.

loans.name: Tiwa

texts.en:
Tiwa is 46 years old and supporting a family of six people. He has been in this business for the last six years, with the monthly income of KES 50,000. 

Tiwa has qualified to get his first loan with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET), in the amount of KES 20,000, which he plans to use to expand his quarry workplace. Tiwa will use the anticipated profit to educate his children. 

His hope and dream is to be a successful man in life.

loans.use: to expand his quarrying workplace.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is the father of three children, one of whom goes to school and two are under school age. He lives in his own house that has no electricity or piped water.

He has operated a retail shop for the past eight years, selling household consumables, like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. 

With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, soap, tea leaves, and wheat flour for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, soap, tea leaves, and wheat flour for resale.

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh, 40, is married and has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Oanh has been running a business of making and selling paper containers for 15 years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more materials to increase her production of making and selling paper containers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her child to school.

loans.use: To buy paper materials to make and sell paper containers.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan, 38, is married and has two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income through making garments. She is running a business of making and selling fiber and plastic bags. 

She started this business six years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of materials to increase her productions.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy materials to make fibre and plastic bags.

loans.name: Monique's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de cinq personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représente du groupe, nommée Monique (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 54 ans. Monique a très peu fréquenté l’école. Monique est divorcée avec trois enfants, dont deux à sa charge. Les charges du ménage sont supportées par Monique. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Monique vend des tissus et des parfums à son domicile et par la méthode distribution depuis sept ans. Monique s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Monique s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group has five members, who all live in the same neighborhood. The group’s representative is called Monique, and is shown with her hand raised in the photo. She is 54 years of age, and didn’t attend school for very long. She is divorced and has three children, two of whom are under her care. 

Monique covers the household expenses and, to provide for her family, she has worked for the past seven years selling fabrics and perfumes both at home and via the distribution system. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. In order to strengthen her business, Monique has joined together with the other members of her group to request their first loan from Alidé.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and perfumes.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a single, 23-year-old businessman in Thika. John operates a motorcycle transport business. He earns a monthly income of KES 12,000, which he uses to support himself and his siblings. This marks his first loan term with KADET. 

With the loan he has applied for from KADET, he will be able to purchase a new motorcycle. The additional income created will allow him to reinvest into the business. In the future, John would like to get married and have children. He hopes to become an established businessman.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is 48 years old, and is married. Her husband runs a shop to sell beverages and coffee to earn a living. Anh runs a general store in front of her door, which she has done for 8 years. She started this business to cover her expenses, and raise her child. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Anh is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more food and many kinds of soft drinks to sell from her store. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks and food.

loans.name: Cau

texts.en: Cau would like to take a new loan to buy a large quantity of rice and beans to make food and sell from her stall. Cau's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a large quantity of rice and beans to make food to sell from her food stall.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: Según referencias de sus vecinos, se pudo afirmar que es un joven trabajador, curso hasta concluir el bachillerato ya que por cuestiones económicas no prosiguió con sus estudios superiores, viéndose en la necesidad de buscar trabajo y por tanto dejar de lado los estudios; de estado civil soltero, pero tiene una hija pequeña. Pudiéndose evidenciar que el señor Jose tiene gran experiencia en el rubro del transporte, además de trabajar los fines de semana como taxista de taxi trufi, es así que hoy desea el crédito para poder realizar mantenimiento al vehículo con el cual trabaja; y así seguir percibiendo este ingreso que le es de gran ayuda para el sustento de este.
texts.en:
According to his neighbors’ references it was possible to confirm that this young worker completed high-school but due to economic questions was unable to continue with higher education.  He needed to find employment and had to leave his schooling behind.  He’s single but has a little girl.  

It was clearly observed that José has extensive experience in the transportation business and also works as a cooperative taxi driver on weekends.  He’d like a loan now to service the vehicle he works with to continue earning this income which greatly helps with his support.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Khoa

texts.en:
Khoa is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock his general store. This purchase will help him to better meet the needs of his customers. His previous loan enabled him to improve his business and offer his customers a greater variety of products.
He hopes that his new loan will assist him in increasing the size of his store and increase sales, and will also help him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of products such as food and beverages to sell from his store

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en:
Hanh is 30 years old and is married. She has a son and lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a driver for hire.

She has run a general store at her house for 8 years. She sells milk, beverages, stationery, confectionery and some household electrical goods. She intends to use her loan to buy many kinds of products to sell such as eggs, sugar, and sanitation items.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and save money for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of products to sell such as eggs, sugar, and sanitation items.

loans.name: Luong

texts.en:
Luong is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 

Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase food and beverages to stock her store.

loans.name: Mardia

texts.en:
Mardia is 27 years old and lives in the area of Congo Town. She’s single and also a high school graduate, with a little income from her boy-friend who sells gasoline at a mini service station. She is determined to make their lives better by getting engaged in a small provision shop. She has been in this business for a year now, and she enjoys the flow of her customers.

Mardia is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, etc, so as to enable her mini provision to become a bigger one. Her dream is to become an accountant in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, etc, so as to enable her mini provision to become a bigger one.

loans.name: Mama

texts.en:
Meet 48-year-old Mama from Liberia, she lives in the community surrounding Airport. She is married, and has six children between 20 and 32; only one lives at home and attends school. 

For the past two years she been running a shop that sells rice, pepper, oil, candy, biscuits, etc.  She started this business with money given to her by her oldest child, and learned this way of selling from her friends. She sells Monday to Saturday, spending 8 hours each day on her business. 

She is appreciative of her business because she makes more money.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase additional goods she sells for her business. She would like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell in her business.

loans.name: Famata

texts.en:
This is 46-year-old Famata from Liberia. She lives in the community surrounding  the airport of Margibi county, which has the largest producing rubber plantation in Liberia. She is single and has three children from 14 to 30 years old. Only one lives at home and attends school. 

She completed seventh grade and started her business six years ago. She described herself as a hardworking woman. She used a little money from her susu (local daily saving) to establish her business. She enjoys her business because she makes more profit and likes dealing with customers. She sells for nine hours each day, six days a week. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more used clothes for her business. Her plan is to increase her business even more. She would like to say thanks to BRAC Liberia and its supporters.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Sorn's Group

texts.en:
Sorn is the father of six children residing in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province.  

He grows rice on one hectare of farmland and raises pigs as his main source of income, while his wife is a vegetable seller. After several years’ engagement in his current business, he is able to earn up to KHR 34,000 per day. 

Sorn is in his second cycle, while his co-borrower is in her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). The past loans have enabled Sorn to improve his lifestyle better than before.  

Now, he is seeking KHR 1,000,000, whereas his fellow group member is applying for KHR 700,000.  As the leader, Sorn will spend his loan portion to buy fertilizer for his farmland and to buy pigs for raising. 

He hopes to gain a good income from his crop in order to buy a small rice mill to support his business.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his farmland and to buy pigs to raise

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Thol

texts.en:
Thol, aged 62, is a mother of six children who lives in a rural village of the Kandal Stoeng district of Kandal province,Cambodia.She is a peasant who has been farming rice and planting vegetables as a primary source of income for almost 10 years. This is the sixth loan for Thol with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has completely repaid, helped her to improve her living conditions to better than they were before.

For this loan, she is applying for 4,000,000 KHR to buy a decent motorbike for her children for commuting back and forth to their workplace. Additionally, she will spend a portion of it to grow more vegetables for resale. She hopes that this purchase will minimize the transportation cost of her kids and support her crops in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her children’s transportation

loans.name: Flor  Maria

texts.es: Doña Flor es originaria de la ciudad de Masaya. Tiene 36 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 10 años. Empezó vendiendo hielo, poco a poco con la ganancia obtenida  fue invirtiendo en productos de consumo diario, logrando establecer su pulpería con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Tiene como otra fuente de ingreso la ayuda económica que le brinda su esposo. Su expectativa es prosperar  en su negocio y llegar a tener una miscelánea. Solicita el crédito para comprar: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón, pasta dental, golosinas entre otros. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda aumentar su inventario, obtener mayores ganancias y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su hogar ya que necesita ampliar su negocio con el fin de brindar mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Flor, 36, is from the city of Masaya.  She’s married and mother of two children.  She’s a merchant by profession and has been in the grocery selling business for ten years.  She started out selling ice and gradually used profits earned to buy basic staples succeeding in establishing her grocery store after much effort and dedication.  Her other source of income is the economic help she gets from her husband.

Her hope is to make progress in her business to the degree of owning a variety store.  She’s asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, toothpaste and snacks, among others.  She figures that the loan will be of much help for her to increase inventory, earn higher profits and satisfy customer demand.  Her future plan is to improve her home’s infrastructure because she needs to expand the business in order to offer better service.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nonvignon Group

texts.fr: NONVIGNON est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représente du groupe, nommée Reine Ayaba (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 41 ans. Reine Ayaba est mariée à un électricien nommé Dominique. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Les charges du ménage sont supportées par Reine Ayaba et son mari. Pour cette raison, Reine Ayaba vend divers produits (sucre, lait, savon etc.) et des condiments dans sa région depuis vingt ans. Reine Ayaba s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Reine Ayaba s’associe aux autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON pour solliciter un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
Nonvignon is a group which has three members, who all live in the same neighborhood. The group’s representative is called Reine Ayaba, and is pictured with her hand raised in the photo. She is 41 years of age, and is married to an electrician called Dominique. The couple has four children, some of whom are at school. All of the children are under their care. 

The household expenses are covered by Reine Ayaba and her husband. It is for this reason that she has worked for 20 years selling various products (such as sugar, milk, and soap) in her region, which she gets from suppliers in a market in Benin. In order to strengthen her business, Reine Ayaba has joined the other members of the Nonvignon group to request a loan from Alidé.

loans.use: To buy various products (such as sugar, milk, and soap) and seasonings.

loans.name: Llapallanchis Purisunchis Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LLAPANCHIS PURISUNCHIS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosario ella es conviviente y tiene 46 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa y lencería, la socia vende chompas,pantalones,polos,medias entre otras ropas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones o sus amigos, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un atienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chompas, medias, polos pantalones y casacas.

Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo despues la foto porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Llapanchis Purisunchis” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  

Rosario, 46, has a spouse and two children.  She works in her business selling clothes and lingerie.  She sells sweaters, pants, shirts and stockings, among other clothes.  She works from 8am until 7pm taking them to various institutions or to her friends.  She’s been in business 8 years and does very well.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the clothes.  She’s asking for the loan to buy sweaters, stockings, shirts, pants and jackets.  She’s grateful to all those who share her dream by this means and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

The other members sell clothes, sell crafts, run grocery stores and sell food.

The members in the photo attached to the group photo had their picture taken after because they asked permission due to work.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Josefa tiene 38 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abonos, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Josefa, 38, lives in the community of Totorani in Paucartambo Province.  She’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who moves her family forward with her effort at work.  Her economic activity is agriculture.  She’s a responsible person which is why she was invited to be part of the “Colque Orcco” communal bank and on this occasion she needs the loan to buy seed and manure.  She’s grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seed and manure.

loans.name: Ascencia

texts.es: Ascencia tiene 55 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abonos, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Ascencia, 55, lives in the community of Totorani in Paucartambo Province.  She’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who moves her family forward by means of her effort at work.  Her economic activity is agriculture.  She’s a responsible person which is why she was invited to be part of the “Colque Orcco” communal bank.  On this occasion she needs the loan to buy seed and manure.  She’s grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seed and manure.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 40 years old and lives in West Point, which has the most populated market in Montserrado County. She is married, with five children, ages 3 and 16. Her kids are going to school and live at home. 

Elizabeth is a high school graduate, and she is a potential business woman who manages her business very well.  Her husband works with an NGO. Notwithstanding she manages her business well to enable her to support her home. 

Over the past ten years she has been running a table at the local market without facing any serious problem. She started this business with a little amount she got from her husband. She sells for six days in every week, spending 10 hours each day on her business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more meat for her business. Her plan is to expand her business even more. She thanks BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more meat to sell

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Kadiatu is in her 40s and married. She has three children between the ages of 2 and 18 years. She runs a general merchandise business in Tombo, in the Western Rural Area in Sierra Leone. She started this business, because she wants to strive for herself and her family's welfare.

She's been in this business since 2006, and she sells things like soda, milk, cigarettes and bread, to her community.  She says that the main problem for her business is her customers' low purchasing power during the rainy season.

Kadiatu requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone. She will use it to buy more products to sell, like soda, milk, cigarettes and biscuits.  She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and improve her standard of living.  In the future, she would like to buy a plot of land.  She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell at her store, like soda, milk, cigarettes and biscuits

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa lives in Montserrado County, where the capital city of Liberia is located. It is well-known as the commercial center of Liberia. Theresa is 45 years old, and she is a widow. She has five children, aged between 20 and 30 years old. She was lucky to have completed the 12th grade, before she began to engage in business.

Over the past ten years, she has been selling fish, bread, and rice in the local market. She started this business with help from her mother, and she learned this way of selling from her mother, also. She spends eight hours each day on her business. Most of the time, she uses a taxi to get her goods to her sales table. She is requesting a loan to buy more bread, rice and fish for her business. She wants to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy more bread, rice and fish, to sell at her table in the market

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis lives in Kilifi county. He is 57 years old and he is married with six children. He operates a garage and autos pares shop in Kilifi. He has been in this business for six years. It is his sole source of income. He heard about Milango from an employee and decided to join so that he could access credit in order to fund his business. He now seeks a loan to buy tyres and other auto spares. He started his business using personal savings and the business is growing despite the challenges of customers not paying their debt in time. He hopes that in five years he will be running a big wholesale business. Extra income from using the loan will improve his standards of living.

loans.use: to buy tyres and other auto spares.

loans.name: Hang's Group

texts.en: As a 33-year-old mother living in a rural area located in the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap Province, Hang is one of the breadwinners of a family consisting of four children. Three of them are still in school. To make a living, she farms rice and cassava as a main source of income. She is able to earn about 33,600 KHR per day from the current business that she has been with for 15 years. Hang is a first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has formed a group of three members to apply for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide and crop seeds for her farming. She hopes to make more income and maintain better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticide and crop seeds for her farming

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann lives around the Airport community.  She is 47 years of age, and she completed the 12th grade before starting her business.  She is married, with six children who live at home and attend school. 

For the past four years she has been selling jewelry in the local market.  She started this business with money given to her by her husband and says she learned this way of selling from people in the market at a time when she was not selling.  She enjoys the business because of the experience she gains every day.  

Her plan is to purchase more jewelry to expand her business and to build a shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more jewelry to expand her business

loans.name: Kimly's Group

texts.en:
A resident from Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chhor district, Cambodia, Kimly is a married mother of four children. Nowadays, her kids rely on her as they are still in school. To cover the daily basic needs of her family, she works at a factory as her main source of income. To supplement the family's income, she and her husband grow rice and raise chickens. With this current business, she can earn about 37,800 KHR per day. 

Kimly has been with Kiva's partner, VisionFund, for two cycles including this loan. The previous loan enabled her to improve her family’s living conditions gradually. Kimly is now leading a group of four to get a new loan from VisionFund. She will spend her portion of the loan on a transplanting fee for her farmland. She hopes to make more income to expand her farmland.

loans.use: To pay a transplanting fee

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Yen

texts.en: Yen is requesting a new loan to buy food and beverages to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy food and beverages for her general store.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es: La Sra. Eusebia tiene 58 años, casada con hijos ya independientes,  ella  se dedica a la venta de comida  en su puesto fijo que se encuentra en la zona de Cota Cota, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución la Sra. Eusebia va a usar este préstamo para Invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas como abarrotes y aceite por mayor, Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital, la Sra. Eusebia enfrenta retos en su negocio ya que los  precios han subido y muchas veces los insumos  escasean y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando insumos, para la elaboración de sus comidas, la Sra. Eusebia es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo  brindado ya que este crédito le permite mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Eusebia, 58, is married with children who are already independent.  She works selling food in her fixed stand located in the Cota Cota zone.  This loan will be her first sequence in the institution and Eusebia will use it to buy ingredients like grocery items and oil at wholesale used to prepare her dishes.

Her reason for requesting this loan is her lack of capital.  The business challenge Eusebia faces is the rise in price that has occurred and ingredients becoming scarce sometimes.  She will use profits to continue buying ingredients to make her dishes.  Eusebia’s a very hardworking woman who feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided because this loan will help her improve her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery items at wholesale.

loans.name: Marisabel

texts.es: La señora Marisabel, es una persona de 21 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, alcanzo a estudiar el bachillerato, cuenta con un dependiente económico el cual es su pequeño hijo, vive en la casa de sus padres de tipo rustico, su principal actividad económica es la agricultura en tal sentido menciona que anualmente produce los siguientes productos agrícolas y en las siguientes cantidades; papa 65 cargas, haba (verde) 47 cargas, maíz (grano) 8 cargas, estos productos mencionados son producidos en los terrenos agrícolas de sus padres sin costo alguno, entonces la señora Marisabel solicita capital de inversión para la compra de un lote de terreno y en futuras oportunidades  con la siembra que va realizar podrá incrementar su producción por lo tanto también su economía al mismo tiempo señala que en el terreno construirá su casa.
texts.en: Marisabel, 21, is single.  She managed to complete high-school.  She has one economic dependent, her little boy.  She lives in her parents’ rustic house.  Her main economic activity is agriculture and she mentions that she grows the following crops in these amounts annually: 65 loads of potatoes, 47 loads of (green) lima beans, 8 loads of corn (grain).  These listed crops are grown on land that belongs to her parents at no cost to her.  Marisabel, then, is asking for the loan to buy a piece of land so that in future she will be able to increase production and as a result her economy too; likewise she indicates that she’ll build her house on the land.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: M. Ashraf

texts.en:
Ashraf is 34 years old and lives in the Lahore area of Pakistan. He has been struggling to get a suitable job for many years but has not been able to find a single suitable job. He is an illiterate person and he is unable to do white-collar jobs. This is the reason he has not been able to get married. 

Ashraf recently started a new business in which he sells mobile phones and phone accessories. He does not have capital to buy new expensive mobile phones of different brands. For expensive mobile phones, he first takes an order and then purchases the new mobile from the market for his customers. This is a lengthy procedure; he wants to buy expensive mobiles so that he can sell them on the spot. He also wants to offers accessories. But he does not have sufficient capital to buy new phones and accessories. 

Therefore, Ashraf has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that he can buy mobile phones and accessories for his shop. Ashraf is hopeful that this business will work well and he will establish it soon so that he can earn income for his family. He will use the profit for a number of tasks such as establishing his shop, paying back the loan and saving money so that he can get married. 

Ashraf is very thankful to Kiva and to its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy mobile phones and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Thary's Group

texts.en: Thary, 33, is a mother of two dependent daughters who are still in school. To earn an income for her family, she has been growing cassava and rubber trees on two hectares of her farmland. Thary is the leader of her group, which consists of two female members; she is a sixth-time borrower whereas her co-borrower is a fourth-cycled client with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). She has fully repaid her past loan, and she used it wisely to improve her living situation.  Now she and her other group member are applying for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR each. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her cassava and rubber trees. She hopes to earn more income from this business so as to sustain her standard of living and provide her daughters with a good education.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide for her cassava and rubber trees.

loans.name: Amistad Cusqueña Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “AMISTAD CUSQUEÑA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es la Sr. Eliazar él es conviviente  tiene 27 años y tiene 1 hijo; el socio altera sus actividades diarias brindando el servicio de taxi, él socio lleva buen tiempo c0on su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio trabaja todos los días durante el dia, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de repuestos para su carro.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de libros, carpinteria, maestro albañil, venta de ropa y brindando el servicio de taxi.
El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Amistad Cusqueña” (Cusco Friendship) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

Eliazar, 27, has a spouse and one son.  He alternates his daily activities with providing taxi services.  He’s been in business a good amount of time and does well thanks to the daily effort he puts into it.  He works every day during the daytime.  He’s a responsible, dedicated person who supports his family this way.

He’s asking for the loan to buy spare parts for his car.  He thanks those who share his dream by this means and commits to make his installment payments as scheduled.

The other group members sell books, are carpenters, master builders, sell clothes and provide taxi services.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his car.

loans.name: Abelio

texts.es: Abelio tiene 27 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la elaboración de muebles de madera como por ejemplo sillas, puertas, mesas, roperos y otro cosas más, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo cola de carpintero,  madera y clavos, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Abelio, 27, lives in the community of Totorani in Paucartambo Province.  He’s a hardworking, enterprising man who supports his family with his work effort.  His economic activity is manufacturing wood furniture like chairs, doors, tables, armoires, etc.  He’s a responsible person which is why he was invited to be part of the “Colque Orcco” communal bank.  On this occasion he needs the loan to buy work supplies like carpenter’s glue, wood and nails.  He’s grateful for and values the loan and commits to make his monthly installment payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong is 43 years old and married with four children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband have been running a food stall to earn a living. 

Phuong started her business ten years ago. She intends to use the loan to gradually expand her business by buying furniture for her stall and food so she can make a variety of different meals to sell to her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food and furniture for her food stall.

loans.name: Chien

texts.en:
Chien is 33 years old and married with two daughters. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn an income by running a food stall. 

She started her business three years ago. She intends to use the loan to gradually expand her business by buying furniture for her stall in order to better serve her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy furniture for her food stall.

loans.name: Gbevivi Group

texts.fr: GBEVIVI est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représente du groupe, nommée Cécile (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 42 ans. Cécile est mariée à un certain Dubond. Le couple a trois enfants,tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Cécile vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les charges du ménage sont supportées par Cécile et son mari. Pour ce faire, Cécile vend à son domicile du charbon de bois depuis dix ans. Cécile s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Cécile s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe GBEVIVI pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
GBEVIVI is a group consisting of three persons from the same neighborhood. The person representing the group is named Cecile (the one raising her hand in the photo) and is 42 years old.

Cecile is married to a person named Dubond. The couple has three children, all of whom attend school and are their dependents. Cecile lives with her ​​husband and children. Household expenses are borne by Cecile and her husband.

To manage this, Cecile has been selling charcoal from her home for the past ten years. She resupplies in one of Benin's markets.

In order to bolster her business, Cecile joined the other members of her GBEVIVI group in requesting a first credit loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Los Alamos De La Estacion Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS ALAMOS DE LA ESTACION”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Leonor Yolanda ella es casada y tiene 51 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de elaboración de tortas y bocaditos, la socia elabora para diferentes eventos como matrimonios, bautizos y cumpleaños, la socia también confecciona forros para muebles, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un pastelería. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para preparar tortas y bocaditos como harina,mantequilla,leche,azucar y huevos.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Los Alamos de la Estación” (The Station’s Poplars) located in Urcos District belonging to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

Leonor Yolanda, 51, is married with three children.  She works in her business baking cakes and snacks.  She bakes them for different events like weddings, baptisms and birthdays.  She also manufactures furniture slipcovers.  She works form 8am until 6pm and has been in business seven years; she does very well.  Her dream is to own a pastry shop.  She’s requesting the loan to buy ingredients like flour, butter, milk, sugar and eggs to make the cakes and snacks.  She thanks those who share her dream by this means and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

The other members sell clothes, sell crafts, are grocers and sell food.

The member in the photo attached to the group photo had her picture taken after the meeting because she asked permission due to work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Enagnon 02 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement ENAGNON 02 est composé de sept personnes qui vivent dans le même village. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de  Marguerite (celle ayant une main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 43 ans et n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite pour une troisième fois l'appui financier de ALIDé. Marguerite est mariée à un électricien du nom de Janvier. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Marguerite vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la maison. C’est pour cette raison que depuis douze ans, Marguerite vend divers produits (ustensiles de cuisine, cuillère etc.) de façon ambulante dans sa région. Marguerite s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d’accroitre le niveau de son activité et de satisfaire sa clientèle, Marguerite sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du ENAGNON 02, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Enagnon 02 group consists of seven persons from the same village. The representative of the group, named Marguerite (the one with a raised hand on the photo), is 43 years old and did not attend school.

In order to raise the level of their business activity to better cope with their customers' demands, the group is requesting for a third time the  financial support from ALIDé. 

Margaret is married to an electrician named January. The couple has three children, all of whom attend school and are their dependents. Margaret lives with her ​​husband and children. The couple shares household expenses.

This is why Marguerite has been selling various products (kitchen utensils, spoons, etc..) as an itinerant vendor in her area for the past ten years. She gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets.

 In order to increase her level of business and satisfy her customers, Marguerite, together with the other members of the Enagnon 02 group, is requesting a third loan from ALIDé. Previous loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: buy kitchen utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cattle and fatten them for resale

loans.name: Erdenebaatar

texts.en: Erdenebaatar is 43 years old. He lives with his wife and 3 children in a ger, a traditional nomadic yurt (a portable felt dwelling), in Hovd province of Mongolia. His wife Nyambayar is currently unemployed and takes care of her family. His oldest child is a university student and his two younger children attend the local secondary school. Erdenebaatar has been driving trucks since 1990. He fixes his own truck and helps other drivers when their vehicles need repair. He has a lot of experience and started his own business of auto repair service at home. He is well-known because of his kindness and his skill at providing auto repair services in town. He is now requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase tools and equipment for his auto repair business. He is a hardworking, helpful and kind person who dreams of building a big auto repair business with all the necessary equipment and tools to provide services to his clients.

loans.use: to purchase tools and equipment for his auto repair business.

loans.name: Maria Abelina

texts.es:
Doña María Abelina tiene una edad de 31 años de edad ama de casa y agricultora madre de 4 hijos los cuales están en diferentes grados de educación en la primaria. Ella es casada y se ha dedicado al cultivo de papa para poder vender y generar ingresos para su familia y hogar y también maíz y frijoles pero esto en ocasiones para la venta ya el objetivo final es para consumo debido a los altos precios en el mercado del mismo. Por muchos años ella se ha dedicado al cultivo de papa ya que fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad por lo que este rubro es la actividad económica principal de su familia. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completado el cual gracias al apoyo por parte de sus padres pudo culminar. Pero su mayor desafío es el de poder obtener al final de cada cuatrimestre una excelente cosecha para su venta ya que hay factores como las lluvias, plagas entre otros que pueden deteriorar sus cultivos y hacer perder una cosecha completa.

Sus planes a futuro son los de obtener excelentes ingresos al final de la cosecha poder re invertir parte de sus ganancias en sus cultivos como también en su casa de habitación ya que necesita mejoras como el piso, repello y un techo más seguro de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su condición de vida haciendo para sus hijos un ambiente más digno. Por lo que hoy en día ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para evitar que sus cultivos de papa carezcan de nutrientes que las hagan desarrollar y fortalecerse.
texts.en:
Maria Abelina, 31, is a homemaker and farmer. She has four children who are all in various grades of primary school. She is married and works by farming potatoes to sell and earn income for her family. She also grows corn and beans to sell sometimes. Her main objective is to farm for consumption due to the high prices of these items on the market. For many years, she has farmed potatoes because her parents taught her how to work the land from an early age. This is her family's primary commercial activity. She completed one grade of primary education, which is thanks to her parents' help. Her biggest challenge is getting a great harvest to sell every season. There are factors such as rain, plagues, and other events that can damage her crop and make her lose the whole harvest.

Her plans for the future are to earn a good income at the end of the harvest so she can reinvest part of her earnings into her crops. She also wants to invest in her home because it needs improvements including the floor, crack repair, and a safer roof. This will improve her quality of life and give her children a better environment. This is why she is currently requesting a loan from COMIXMUL. With the loan, she will buy the supplies necessary to make sure her crops have nutrients so they can develop and grow.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for farming potatoes

loans.name: Theoneste

texts.en:
Theoneste is 43 years old. He is married to a farmer. They have five children aged between three and sixteen and they all go to school. With the loan, he would like to buy fertilizers and quality seeds to use in the production of potatoes. The profits from the produce will be used to provide food for the family and to upgrade the standards of the family members by providing medical insurance for them.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers and quality seeds to use in the production of potatoes.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Les femmes du groupe DANAYA, toutes mariées, ont en moyenne 35 ans, 3 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies dans la ville de Barouéli, Région de Ségou (quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce d‘habillement, de condiments de produits cosmétiques.                                                                               
Les femmes du groupe  DANAYA sont à leur quinzième prêt solidaire qui sera utilisé pour acheter citées.                                                                
La cliente DJAMOU la deuxième personne à partir de la droite est vendeuse de condiments. Elle achète ses condiments auprès des grossistes à Barouéli et effectue ses ventes au comptant à crédit  et en détail à une clientèle diverse et variée. Avec ce prêt elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50.000 FCFA qui sera réinvesti dans l’activité de vente de condiment.
texts.en:
The Danaya group of women are all married and on average are 35 years old with three children. They all live in traditional extended families in the city of Barouéli, in the Segou region (fourth administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

They became acquainted through kinship ties, as neighbors and through friendship. They sell clothing, condiments, and beauty products.
The Danaya group of women are on their fifteenth group loan which will be used to buy the above-mentioned products.

Group member Djamou, the second person from the right, sells condiments. She buys her condiments from wholesalers in Barouéli and sells them retail for cash or credit  to a diverse and varied clientele.

With this loan she expects to achieve an average monthly profit of 50,000 CFA francs, which will be reinvested in the condiment retail business.

loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Lawuo

texts.en:
Lawuo is 39 years old; she lives in airport community. She stopped her education in 8th grade, and she is married and has three children between 5 and 10 years old. They are living with her and going to school. 

For the past ten years she has been selling pepper, rice, salt, etc. in the local market. A problem that she facing is a goods shortage since she doesn't have a save store. She likes her business because it provides for her needs. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase pepper, rice, salt, etc. to expand her business. Her plans are to educate her children and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase pepper, rice, salt, etc. to expand her business,

loans.name: Ndèye

texts.fr:
Madame Ndèye une dame très active, fait du petit commerce depuis plus de 20 ans. Elle a démarré avec un très faible revenu en vendant de petites denrées alimentaires devant chez elle. Elle s’appuyait aussi sur l’aide financière que lui donnait l’IMCEC avec les crédits octroyés. 
Madame Ndèye est mariée et mère de famille. Elle adore sa famille et le petit commerce qu’elle fait l’aide à s’occuper d’elle.
Avec le crédit qu’elle veut renouveler, elle compte améliorer son commerce de vente de légumes. Elle s’active de 6h du matin à 14h de l’après midi.
Grace aux bénéfices acquis, elle peut améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille et subvenir à leurs besoins.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ndèye is a very active lady, who as been in the retail business for over 20 years. She started with a very low income by selling small food products in front of her home. She also relied on the assistance provided by IMCEC through the granting of loans.

Mrs. Ndèye is married and a mother. She loves her family and her small business activity helps her to take care of them.

With the loan she wants to renew she intends to improve her business selling vegetables. She is active from 6 am to 2 in the afternoon.

Thanks to the profits earned, she can improve the family's nutritional conditions and answer their needs.

loans.use: buy vegetables for resale

loans.name: Elsa Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa tiene 44 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abonos, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Tomasa is 44 years old and lives in the community of Totorani in the province of Paucartambo. She is a hard working and enterprising person who is moving her family forward through the force of her labor. She is a farmer and a responsible person. Thus she was invited to participate in the Colque Orcco Communal Bank. At this time she needs a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer. She is grateful for and appreciates the loan and is committed to making her monthly payments on time in a responsible manner.

loans.use: to puchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Cheng's Group

texts.en: Cheng lives in a village of Tbaung Khmum district Kampong of Cham province, Cambodia. She is 35 years old and a married mother of three children, all of them are still in school. To cover the daily cost of living, she works for pay by tapping rubber to collect latex. Cheng is in a group consisting of three members. It is the third loan for Cheng, and the second loan cycle for her group members with VisionFund. They are applying for a new loan in total amount of 3,200,000 KHR. As the group leader, Cheng is going to use her loan portion to buy a motorbike to support her business as well as for commuting. She hopes that this purchase will help her to reduce transportation costs which she has to cover.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to support her business as well as for commuting

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Narem's Group

texts.en:
Narem is a married mother of three schoolchildren. She and the rest of her family are living in the Dambae district of Kampong Cham where she does her cassava farming on three hectares area. 

Never having been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), she forms a group of two to get a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) in order to pay for plowing fees and labor costs for her farmland. 

She highly believes that she can gain a good yield from her agribusiness and keep her kids in school.

loans.use: To pay for plowing fees and labor costs for her farmland

loans.name: Wilder

texts.es: El Sr. Wilder es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería en medio ambiente en una universidad de la Ciudad de La Paz, el tiene 25 años de edad, desde muy pequeño mostro inclinaciones a los números y lo que es el cuidado del medio ambiente por este motivo decidió estudiar esta carrera, sus papas pagaban sus gastos de estudio, pero el decidió sacar crédito en la institución para pagar sus gastos de titulación como la realización de su proyecto final,   Y con su  trabajo el  podrá pagar sus cuotas, el es un joven responsable su único deseo es poder ejercer su profesión y así ayudar a sus padres a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Wilder is studying environmental engineering at a university in the city of La Paz.  He is 25 years old and, since he was very young age, he has been interested in numbers and looking after the environment.  With this in mind, he decided to take on these studies.  His parents paid for the costs of his classes but Wilder has decided to take out a loan to pay for his final degree title and to complete his final project.  With his work, Wilder will be able to make his repayments.  Wilder is responsible young man and his only desire is to practise his trade and help his parents to improve their quality of living.

loans.use: to pay for his final degree title.

loans.name: Dúo Flor Que Ayer Plante Group

texts.es:
Dúo la flor que ayer plante


Dúo conformado por Josefa, originaria de san Martín Jilotepeque, Josefa posee desde hace más de once años una tienda de consumo diario.a encontrado en este negocio una fuente de ingresos y así poder tener los ingresos necesarios para poder darles estudio a sus hijos. Ha sido responsable en sus pagos y quiere seguir luchando, en su negocio espera que le puedan seguir ayudando en su negocio, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia de consumo diario,y la otra compañera Dina se dedica a la crianza de pollos, solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos, concentrado.
texts.en:
The "La Flor que ayer planté" duo

One member of this group is Josefa, who is originally from San Martón Jilotepeque.  For the last eleven years Josefa has had a shop selling basic, consumable goods and, with this business, she has found a source of income.  She is able to earn the necessary money in order to be able to provide her children with an education.  Josefa has been responsible with her payments and wants to continue fighting for her business.  Josefa is applying for a loan in order to buy consumable products.  The other member of the group, Dina, makes a living raising chickens.  She is applying for a loan in order to buy chickens and feed.

loans.use: to buy consumable products to sell.

loans.name: El Altiplano Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “EL ALTIPLANO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
La socia es la Sra. Yanira ella es soltera tiene 39 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de casacas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende en una de las ferias que se realizan los días sabados, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito  para la compra de casacas para su negocio.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de celulares, negocio de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, venta de lencería y negocio de venta de ropa.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
 La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank El Altiplano. This bank is located in the district of Anta, belonging to the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

The member is Yanira. She is single, 39 years old and has 2 children. The member alternates her daily activities with the business of selling jackets. Things are going well with her business thanks to the effort she puts in each day to her work. She works in one of the fairs held on Saturdays. She is a responsible and diligent person. She wants to be able to continue working in this way to support her family.

The member is asking for a loan in order to buy jackets for her business.

The other members work selling cellphones, in clothing businesses, grocery stores, and selling linens.

The person with a covered face does not belong to the communal bank.

The members in the attached photo asked permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work reasons.

The member is grateful to those who are a part of this dream through this means and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy jackets for her business.

loans.name: Enang

texts.en:
Enang lives in Bandung, about three hours from Jakarta. He manages a small shop selling groceries, snacks, drinks, and mobile phone airtime credit. Enang is married.

Enang joined Ruma one month ago because he finds it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Enang sees improvements in his shop. For the last month, he has earned an average of $15 - $20 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales. 

He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions. His goal for his business is to expand into more new business in the future.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Marco

texts.en:
Marco lives in Bandung, about three hours from Jakarta. She manages a small shop selling groceries, snacks and mobile phone airtime credit. Marco is married.

Marco joined Ruma two months ago because she finds it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Marco sees improvements in her shop. For the last two months, she has earned an average of $50 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales. 

She hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions. Her goal for her business is to expand into more new business in the future.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo tiene 43 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura, la ganadería y la venta de lácteas, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Tres Cruces de Oro” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimentos como concentrados, pasto y forraje, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Pablo is 43 years old and lives in the Totorani community in the Paucartambo province.  He is hard-working and enterprising, and is helping his family to prosper through the effort he makes at work.  Pablo is a farmer and has cattle and sells dairy products.  He is responsible and, for this reason, was invited to be a part of the "Tres Cruces de Oro" communal bank.  On this occasion Pablo needs a loan to buy food, such as animal feeds, fodder, and forage.  Pablo is grateful for and knows the value of this loan. He promises to be responsible with his monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy food, such as animal feeds, fodder, and forage.

loans.name: Alfa Y Omega -31 Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento ALFA Y OMEGA -31 está  compuesto por ocho  integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones, el  presidente del  banco es el Sr. Paolo,Tiene 21 años, el se dedica  al servicio de atención en distintos acontecimientos sociales como moso,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Paolo va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de vajilla para  su negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, el Sr. Paolo va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una tienda de alquiler de vajilla y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a el y a sus compañeras del grupo ya que en muchos casos son personas que sacan adelante solas a sus familias.
texts.en:
The ALFA Y OMEGA – 31 Communal Bank is composed of eight members, six women and two men. The president of the bank is Sr. Paolo. He is 21 years old and dedicates himself to providing services at different social events, such as waiters, etc. This is his first loan from Emprender.

Sr. Paolo is going to use this loan to purchase an assortment of tableware for his business. The reason he is applying for this loan is to continue improving his business. He will use the profits to continue buying a variety of products so that he can improve his earnings. He wants to have a store to rent tableware as part of his business. In that way he can provide better service to his customers. He is happy for the opportunity provided him and his colleagues in the bank because in many cases they are all people who are helping their families get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase dinnerware.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is 44 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a worker at a factory in their local community. She earns income by running a food stall, where she sells bread and pork. 

She started her business four years ago. With this loan, she intends to gradually expand her business by buying more bread and pork to sell to her customers. 

She hopes that her business will run smoothly and that it will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy bread and pork.

loans.name: Elena Angelina

texts.es: Doña Elena es originaria de Corinto. Tiene 50 años de edad, casada, madre de 5 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a brindar el servicio de Cyber  desde hace 6 años.  Ella inicio su negocio con 4 computadoras, poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación aumento su inventario logrando la comercialización de productos escolares. Tiene como otra fuente de ingreso la ayuda económica que recibe de su esposo e hija. Solicita el crédito para la reparación y mantenimiento de sus equipos como son: monitor, CPU, fotocopiadora e impresora, estima que el crédito será de mucho éxito para su negocio, ya que podrá ofrecer un servicio completo y de calidad para la satisfacción de sus clientes. Sus planes futuros son comprar equipos nuevos de mejor tecnología y mejorar la infraestructura del local.
texts.en:
Elena, 50, is from Corinto. She is married and has five children. She is a businesswoman and has worked in the Cyber Cafe business for six years. She started her business with four computers. Little by little, and with a lot of effort and dedication, she increased her inventory and expanded to sell school products. As another source of income, she has the economic support of her husband and daughter.

She is requesting this loan to repair and maintain her equipment including monitors, PCs, photocopiers, and printers. She believes the loan will be very successful for her business since she will be able to offer a wide range of quality services to satisfy her customers. Her plans for the future are to buy new equipment with better technology and improve the infrastructure of her space.

loans.use: to repair and maintain equipment including monitors, PCs, photocopiers, and printers.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung is a 53-year-old married woman. She lives with four children and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a driver for hire. For 33 years, she has run a business of selling beverages for people in her community.

Dung would like a loan to purchase beverages and furniture for her shop. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: To buy furniture and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Pratiwi

texts.en:
Pratiwi runs a small stall where she sells mobile phone airtime credits and processes bill payments. Pratiwi lives in Cilegon, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta.  She is married and has children.

Pratiwi began working with Ruma two and a half years ago because she wanted to increase her income and business by selling mobile airtime and servicing bill payments. She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. For the last three months, she has had around $30- $35 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). 

Recently, she took a loan for getting a printer from Kiva to support her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments (household electricity payments).

loans.use: to buy a printer to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Thorn

texts.en:
Residing in Ponhea Leu district of Kandal province, Thorn is 58 years old and a mother of four children. Nowadays, one child is studying at a local university. To provide for the daily costs of living for her family, she tailors clothes at home as her main source of income. This is the business that she has had for ages. 

This is the second microloan for Thorn with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her past loan wisely and on time to support her living. 

Now, she is in need of financial support for one of her daughters, who wants to study for vocational training in wedding embellishing skills. She hopes that her daughter can have a specific skill to make a living.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's vocational training in wedding embellishing skills.

loans.name: Phung

texts.en:
Phung is a 49-year-old married woman. She lives with her four sons and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a security guard for a company. For 19 years, she has run a business of selling cosmetic products to people in her community.

Phung would like a loan to purchase better quality products. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan, she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for selling.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a 37-year-old married woman. She lives with her two sons and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a worker for a local company. For 14 years, she has run a business of selling pork and noodles to people in her community.

Thuy would like a loan to purchase better quality ingredients and noodles to sell to her customers. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan, she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and noodles for selling.

loans.name: Vicentina

texts.es: Vicentina tiene 55 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Sunchubamba en la provincia de Paucartambo, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y otras cosas más, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Tres Cruces de Oro” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y fideos, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Vicentina is 55 years old and lives in the community of Sunchubamba in the province of Paucartambo. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who supports her family through the efforts of her work. Her financial activity is selling staples such as, for example, rice, sugar, noodles, milk and other things.
